import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Nav, Navbar, NavDropdown } from "react-bootstrap"; import "../css/Shop.css"; /* The Header class is the top bar containing the size and lighting filters, price sort selection */ class Header extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = {}; } render() { return (
{/* Filter by Size button group */} Size:
All Desktop Medium Large
{/* Filter by Lighting button group */} Lighting:
All Low Light Medium Light Bright Light
{/* Sort by Price Dropdown */} Sort by Price: Select Lowest to Highest Highest to Lowest
); } } export default Header;
